definition: to ask to buy/to bid for purchase
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen

sentences.english: This is a free online application service with no additional charges to the applicant.
sentences.chinese: 此为免费网上申购服务，申请者毋须缴交额外费用。

sentences.english: On the other hand, keep the requisitioning and approval.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，严把申购审核关。

sentences.english: Design the POR for related materials and keep in contact with the supplier.
sentences.chinese: 制作相关材料的申购单，联系供应商并跟进采购单。

sentences.english: The investors who are to participate in the off-line allotment shall fully pay the subscription price.
sentences.chinese: 参与网下配售的投资者应全额缴付申购款。

definition: to win a ballot/to draw a lucky number
to ration merchandise (esp. food in times of shortages)
to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
limit up, limit down/limit on daily price variation
